item.title: What happened next when SPY jumped over 2%
item.description: Last week, SPY jump over 2% on Thursday This was surprising for many as the market is already up a lot. So, I wanted to see what happened the next day when SPY jumped over 2%. Here are the results over the last 10 years. The next day change after a 2% jump Next Day Change Number of Occurrences Percentage < 0 33 55.93% > 0 25 42.37% > 1 % 13 22.
